captions.text: I, the heart on loan, thought everything was lost
And I couldn't find my way to the sun
I, who no longer flew, dreamt only in black and white, until you brought the color back to my life
I thought I'd loved before, but ever since you came, it's like the first time
Your hands lit fires that won't go off, won't ever go off
Whispers, the two of us alone in the night, nothing can tear us apart, I want to run away with you
Whispers, we float in the night, unchained hearts, our love is freedom
I, who no longer dreamt, with broken wings I fell and didn't care if it hurt
I, just a lost soul, wanted a new start, when you heard my calling
I thought I'd loved before, but ever since you came, it's like the first time
Your hands lit fires that won't go off, won't ever go off
Whispers, the two of us alone in the night, nothing can tear us apart, I want to run away with you
Whispers, we float in the night, unchained hearts, our love is freedom
When you touch me, a star lits up, you draw rainbows on my skin
And when you whisper love words to me, I'd jump off a cliff, just to fly with you
Come on, lit me like a star, you draw rainbows on my skin
And when you whisper love words to me, I'd jump off a cliff, just to fly with you
Whispers
Our love is freedom
Whispers, the two of us alone in the night, nothing can tear us apart, I want to runaway with you
Whispers, we float in the night, unchained hearts, our love is freedom
Whispers
